title: Large-Scale Design of Web-Based Mobile Learning App Prototyping

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and intermediate-level understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: A course where learners experience mobile learning app design using web-based prototyping tools in a BYOD environment, incorporating continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can design the basic interface of a mobile language learning app using web-based prototyping tools
Learners can revise prototypes at least twice based on formative assessment feedback
Learners can collaborate with peers to implement at least three interactive elements suitable for mobile learning scenarios

resources: Google Figma or Adobe XD Web Version

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
